notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: M.R.B. and M.B. act as guarantors of this article. M.R.B., P.A., M.J.C., A.F. and M.B. designed the electronic alert system and draft the article. P.G. and L.R. collected the clinical data. R.B. and M.L.R. carried out the analysis and interpretation of data. F.B., M.B. and R.E. reviewed the manuscript. All authors approved the final version of the article.
